value: You see, but you do not observe
author: Sherlock Holmes

value: Hello, World
author: computer

value: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it
author: Charles R. Swindoll

value: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground
author: Theodore Roosevelt

value: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are
author: Theodore Roosevelt

value: That's one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind
author: Neil Armstrong

value: Not just beautiful, though--the stars are like the trees in the forest, alive and breathing. And they're watching me
author: Haruki Murakami

value: I would like to die on Mars. Just not on Impact
author: Elon Musk

value: Language is a virus from outer space
author: William S. Burroughs

value: Although the life of a person is a land full of thorns and weeds, there is always a space in which the good seed can grow. You have to trust God
author: Pope Francis

value: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow
author: Edward Teller

value: It has been appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity
author: Albert Einstein

value: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important
author: Bill Gates

value: Technology is nothing. What's important is that you have a faith in people, that they're basically good and smart, and if you give them tools. they'll do wonderful things with them
author: Steve Jobs

value: We live in a society exquisitely dependent on science and technology, in which hardly anyone knows anything about science and technology
author: Carl Sagan

value: The Internet is so big, so powerful and pointless that for some people it is a complete substitute for life
author: Andrew Brown

value: Men have become tools of their tools
author: Henry David Thoreau

value: Our technological powers increase, but the side effects and potential hazards also escalate
author: Alvin Toffer

value: The technology is just so far gone. It's just like back in the day you needed a suitcase just to have a cell phone. The battery was so heavy, it was like carrying a gallon of soda around with you all day
author: Jam Master Jay

value: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic
author: Arthur C. Clarke

value: I'm interested in things that change the world or that affect the future and wondrous, new technology where you see it, and you're like, 'Wow, how did that even happen? How is that possible?'
author: Elon Musk

value: We've arranged a civilization in which most crucial elements profoundly depend on science and technology
author: Carl Sagan

value: The technology keeps moving forward, which makes it easier for the artists to tell their stories and paint the pictures they want
author: George Lucas

value: Every aspect of human technology has a dark side, including the bow and arrow
author: Margaret Atwood

value: Technology gives us the facilities that lessen the barriers of time and distance - the telegraph and cable, the telephone, radio, and the rest
author: Emily Greene Balch

value: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact
author: William James

value: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, 'I used everything you gave me'.
author: Erna Bombeck

value: The quickest way to double your money is to fold it over and put it back in your pocket
author: Will Rogers

value: Even if you’re on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there
author: Will Rogers

value: When I hear somebody sigh, ‘Life is hard,’ I am always tempted to ask, ‘Compared to what'?
author: Sydney Harris

value: Nurture your mind with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes
author: Benjamin Disraeli

value: The real opportunity for success lies within the person and not in the job
author: Zig Ziglar

value: Look at the sparrows; they do not know what they will do in the next moment. Let us literally live from moment to moment
author: Mahatma Gandhi

value: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get
author: Ray Kroc

value: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be
author: Lao Tzu

value: You may find the worst enemy or best friend in yourself
author: English Proverb

value: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

value: There are two ways of spreading the light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it
author: Edith Wharton

value: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

value: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings
author: William Blake

value: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground
author: Theodore Roosevelt

value: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later
author: Og Mandino

value: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence
author: Helen Keller

value: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

value: Quality is not an act, it is a habit
author: Aristotle

value: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me
author: Carol Burnett

value: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough
author: Og Mandino

value: It always seems impossible until it's done
author: Nelson Mandela

value: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

value: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
author: Confucius

value: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

value: The secret of getting ahead is getting started
author: Mark Twain

value: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory
author: George S. Patton

value: Setting the steps is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible
author: Tony Robbins

value: If you can dream it, you can do it
author: Walt Disney

value: Where thou art, that is home
author: Emily Dickinson

value: The purpose of art is washing the dust life off our souls
author: Pablo Piccaso

value: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art
author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

value: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

value: The world is a canvas to our imagination
author: Henry David Thoreau

value: Next to the Word of God, the noble art of music is the greatest treasure in the world.
author: Martin Luther

value: Photograph: a picture painted by the sun without instruction in art
author: Ambrose Bierce

value: I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination
author: Albert Einstein

value: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting
author: Sun Tzu

value: Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others
author: Jonathan Swift

value: Don't you know that every perfect life would mean the end of art?
author: Robert Musil

value: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures
author: Henry Ward Beecher

value: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection
author: Michaelangelo

value: Art is a harmony parallel with nature
author: Paul Cezanne

value: The art of art, the glory of expression an the sunshine of the light of letters, is simplicity
author: Walt Whitman

value: Every painting is a voyage into sacred harbour
author: Giotto di Bondone

value: An artist cannot fail; it is a success to be one
author: Charles Horton Cooley

value: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up
author: Pablo Picasso

value: Painting is poetry that is seen rather than felt, and poetry is painting that is felt rather than seen
author: Leonardo da Vinci

value: Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth
author: Pablo Picasso

value: A painter should begin every canvas with a wash of black, because all things in nature are dark except where exposed by the light
author: Leonardo da Vinci

value: I dream my painting and I paint my dream
author: Vincent Van Gogh

value: If you ask me what I came to do in this world, I, an artist, will answer you: I am here to live out loud
author: Emile Zola

value: Art and love are the same thing: It’s the process of seeing yourself in things that are not you
author: Chuck Klosterman

value: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time
author: Thomas Merton

value: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life
author: Pablo Picasso

value: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see
author: Edgar Degas

value: Creativity takes courage
author: Henri Matisse

value: Art is the only serious thing in the world. And the artist is the only person who is never serious
author: Oscar Wilde

value: You might as well ask an artist to explain his art, or ask a poet to explain his poem. It defeats the purpose. The meaning is only clear thorough the search
author: Rick Riordan

value: There are two best days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why
author: William Barclay

value: Cakes are special. Every birthday, every celebration ends with something sweet, a cake, and people remember. It's all about the memories.
author: Buddy Valastro

value: You don't get older, you get better.
author: Shirley Bassey

value: The best way to remember your wife's birthday is to forget it once.
author: E. Joseph Cossman

value: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
author: Oprah Winfrey

value: Don't just count your years, make your years count
author: George Meredith

value: You know you are getting old when the candles cost more than the cake
author: Bob Hope

value: Today is the oldest you've ever been and youngest you'll ever be again
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

value: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!
author: Dr. Seuss

value: I hope your special day will bring you lots of happiness, love and fun. You deserve them a lot. Enjoy!
author: Birthday Wishes

value: Have a wonderful birthday. I wish your every day to be filled with lots of love, laughter, happiness and the warmth of sunshine.
author: Wishes

value: May your coming year surprise you with the happiness of smiles, the feeling of love and so on. I hope you will find plenty of sweet memories to cherish forever. Happy birthday.
author: Wishes

value: On your special day, I wish you good luck. I hope this wonderful day will fill up your heart with joy and blessings. Have a fantastic birthday, celebrate the happiness on every day of your life. Happy Birthday!!
author: Wishes

value: May this birthday be filled with lots of happy hours and also your life with many happy birthdays, that are yet to come. Happy birthday.
author: Wishes

value: Let’s light the candles and celebrate this special day of your life. Happy birthday.
author: Wishes

value: You are very special and that’s why you need to float with lots of smiles on your lovely face. Happy birthday.
author: Wishes

value: Special day, special person and special celebration. May all your dreams and desires come true in this coming year. Happy birthday.
author: Wishes

value: You are my true friend. You were always with me, you supported me, you boosted me up when I was down. Thanks for being such a friend of mine. Happy birthday.
author: Wishes

value: Let your all the dreams to be on fire and light your birthday candles with that. Have a gorgeous birthday.
author: Wishes

value:
Birthday come around every year but friends like you only come in a lifetime I'm so glad you come into my life.
Best Wishes on your special day
author: Wishes

value: Our birthdays are feathers in the broad wing of time
author: Jean Paul Richter

value: A birthday is like a new year and my wish for you is a great year full of happiness and sunshine!
author: Wishes

value: May happiness and sunshine fill your day not only on your birthday but the whole year through
author: Wishes

value: A birthday is a time to reflect on the year gone by, but to also set your goals for the upcoming year
author: Catherine Pulsifier

value: So happy another year has found you, may it be the best year yet
author: Julie Hebert

value: Men are like wine. Some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age
author: Pope John XXIII

value: If we had one wish for you on this special day it would be: May the best of your past be the worst of your future
author: Wishes

value: Birthdays are good for you. Statistics show that the people who have the most live the longest
author: Larry Lorenzoni

value: May you have miles of smiles in the coming year. We wish only the best for you today and throughout the coming year
author: Wishes

value: Our birthdays are feathers in the broad wing of time
author: Jean Paul
